ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Suukie climbed to his feet, dripping with blood..he held his stomach with a warped face expression....he looked at stinkomb....he kicked him but slipped in the

Suukie climbed to his feet, dripping with blood..he held his stomach with a
warped face expression....he looked at stinkomb....he kicked him but slipped
in the process, falling on his ass.....he crawled back into the base slowly
moving the fifle from side to side..... "good gun." he thought, "i think
i'll keep it....." he had got it from the store room when he was in there
earlier.....he looked up at the CR Chamber...... crawled over to
it....pressed the open button, and hurled himself in to a scream.......
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 23, 2000 11:16 PM
Subject: Re: You're all crazy!


> Stinkbomb/Ramhorn/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Anubis/Hades:
>
> ::Stinkbomb as he fired his shots off at Suukie, smiling in satisfaction,
not
> feeling the other laser bolts (which rather coincidentally came out of a
> heavy laser rifle that Suukie's never used before in the war) tear through
> him, his head suddenly slamming against the wall repeatedly he was leaning
> against, his arm jerking forward, the detonator slamming into Ramhorn's
face::
>
> ::Ramhorn awoke, looking to the detonator, then the toppled over forms of
> Suukie and Stinkbomb::
> "Enemies...OF THE OVERMIND!" ::Ramhorn, not as badly damaged yelled,
getting
> up, holing the detonator.  Reaching into subspace, he pulled out two
charges,
> tossing them between Suukie and Stinkbomb, running over to the charges,
> setting them to explode in 10 seconds.  Walking outside of the bridge,
> Ramhorn waits for the two charges to go off::
> "Five, four, three, two, one...ZERO!" he counts off, the charges should've
> been exploding about then.
>
> ===================
>
> ::Koga Shuko looked from Unitron, to Anubis, to Hades::
> "Let's move out!" ::he yelled, all four heading for the Alliance base::
>
